row.col: It has been suggested that be into this article or section. ()

bdy.p:
This is a list of notable theatrical feature films produced by Walt Disney Productions and its successor label,
Walt Disney Pictures .

sec.p:
If Walt Disney Productions did not produce the film and only distributed it, the film will not be included on this list. This list also does not include films labeled, produced or distributed by other Disney imprints or subsidiaries, including
Touchstone Pictures ,
Miramax Films ,
Hollywood Pictures , and
Dimension Films , nor does it include any direct-to-video releases.

Key:
Green =
True Life Adventures
Yellow = Animated features
Red =
Both animated features and live action
White =
Live-Action released only in 3-D
